div.p: Thanks to meteorologist Belinda Jensen for visiting Meadowview Elementary.
Dodge Middle School’s Team Kawaakari took second place overall, and also received the People’s Choice special award in the Future Cities competition.

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

strong.span: All Farmington Area Public Schools will be closed and participating in Distance Learning from March 30 - May 4, 2020.

span.strong: Child Care for Children of Emergency Workers:

span.style: font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: Under the Governor’s Executive Order 20-20, free child care for the children of emergency workers was outlined.

a.title: emergency childcare info
a.span: For more information and registration details, please click here.

strong.em: Igniting Learning. Impacting Communities. Inventing Our Tomorrows.

p.span: The mission of Farmington Area Public Schools, a student centered culture that radiates a dream of an entirely new educational world, is to ensure each student continuously achieves one’s highest aspirations while demonstrating responsibility to communities through a system distinguished by:

li.span: personal reflection which gives meaning to learning;
radical trust in self and others.

div.div: At the April 14, 2020 Special School Board Meeting the School Board interviewed three candidates and determined that Mr. Jason Berg was the finalist for the position of Superintendent of Farmington Area Public Schools. The Board met again on Friday, April 17, 2020 and voted to offer the position of Superintendent of Farmington Area Public Schools to Mr. Jason Berg pending contract negotiations.
div.a: Read More about Berg Offered Superintendent Position

div.div: In honor of the Farmington High School 2020 graduating class, over the next several weeks we will be highlighting a few of our outstanding seniors. These students have been nominated by Farmington Area Public Schools staff members for exhibiting hard work and pursuing their spark with passion during their time at FHS. Today’s Senior Spotlight is: Sydney Dimapelis!
div.a: Read More about 2020 Senior Spotlight: Sydney Dimapelis

div.div: Happy Friday, Tigers! It's time for another Weekly Update video! Several FHS staff members shared their senior photos on social media this week in honor of the the class of 2020. In case you missed it, we've compiled a few at the end of this video. We would love to see your senior pictures too. Tag us @District192 | #WeAre192
div.a: Read More about Weekly Update, April 17
